Callitrichinae.EditorialNote: This class is not intended to present a normative, comprehensive, taxonomic hierarchy, but rather is provided as an approximate indication of the phylogenetic relatedness amongst the taxonomic groups nested under it (BB)., GBIF does not include subfamilies under Primates.  It tends to skip from Order (Primate), to Family to Genus. NCBI Tax considers this taxon to be synonymous with Callitrichidae, which GBIF considers to be a Family at the same level as Cebidae.
